summary:
Semaglutide is a medicine that helps people with type 2 diabetes control their blood sugar. It is also used to help people lose weight. This drug is like a natural body hormone called GLP-1. You can take it by injection or as a pill.

Common side effects include stomach problems like nausea and diarrhea. It was first approved in the US in 2017 and is now one of the most prescribed medications in the country.
title: Semaglutide
